ing: 1/4 cup brown sugar, or to taste
des: "Oatmeal so creamy it's like tapioca! You will absolutely love this recipe. This is how oatmeal was meant to be!"
ins: Just before going to bed, combine the oats and water in a slow cooker. Set on Low, cover, and let cook overnight. In the morning, stir in the salt and half-and-half. Scoop into bowls, and sprinkle brown sugar over the top.
